releaseNotes:
Welcome to the Big City! We've rebuilt the game from the ground up and you’ll explore the city through 57 new lessons, meet 7 new animal buddies, and take on 57 brand new lessons specifically designed for this app and not available anywhere else!

UNLIMITED MODE
After completing the main course, unlock unlimited extra challenge levels designed to put your skills to the test!

NEW BUDDIES 
• Two new apartment pets: Pinky & Rocco
• One new city animal: Oliver
• Four new park animals: Daisy, Bella, Dudley, and Chloe

AND MORE
• Updated for the latest version of iOS
• Now in widescreen
• Performance improvements
description:
ANIMAL KINDERGARTEN MATH GAMES brings a delightful learning experience to kids, blending education with entertainment in the most engaging way possible! With a colorful array of adorable animal friends, from Rocco the Rooster to Oliver Horse, children will navigate more than 100 fun math games. These games are specifically designed to help your child improve their math skills while enjoying a thrilling adventure across a bustling city filled with curious animals.


KINDERGARTEN HAS NEVER BEEN THIS FUN!
Whether your child is learning to count or mastering addition and subtraction, Animal Kindergarten Math Games is the perfect platform for enhancing their math knowledge. Designed by parents and teachers, this game adheres to learning standards used in real classrooms, ensuring an educational foundation that aligns with school curriculums. It’s ideal for reinforcing what kids are learning in school or giving them a head start in math for kindergarten and 1st grade.


KEY FEATURES
• Math for Kindergarten: Learn essential math concepts like counting, number recognition, and basic addition and subtraction.
• Animal Math: Join fun animal pals on a learning journey, helping them solve math challenges in a lively city environment.
• Kindergarten Math Games: Over 100 fun and educational math activities designed to make learning exciting and rewarding for young learners.
• Kids Math Games: Perfectly suited for kids ages 3-7, with features like professional narration, lively music, and positive reinforcement to keep them motivated.
• Math Games for Kids Free: Enjoy a wide variety of free-to-play levels, ensuring kids can practice and learn math without any limitations.


MATH CONCEPTS COVERED
• Counting & Number Recognition Learn to count to 100 by ones and tens. Answer “How many?” questions by counting objects. Compare two numbers between 1 and 10, and identify which is bigger or smaller. Count forward from any number without needing to start at 1.
• Addition & Subtraction: Practice adding and subtracting with fun objects and animals. Develop fluency in adding and subtracting within 5, progressing to higher numbers. Compare quantities to determine “more” or “less,” and solve simple math problems with ease.
• Categories and Geometry: Classify objects into specific categories and count them. Identify shapes like rectangles, triangles, and more, comparing their size and attributes. Explore 2D and 3D shapes, learning to describe them based on sides, vertices, and other geometric properties.


KINDER MATH MADE EASY
Designed to cater to young minds, Animal Kindergarten Math Games offers a range of interactive exercises to help children grasp critical math concepts. From counting to problem-solving, every game is tailored to ensure kids build a strong foundation in math. Whether they are tackling Math for Kids or engaging in Math Games for 1st Grade, the games offer progressive levels that grow with your child's abilities.


EDUCATIONAL GAMES FOR KIDS FREE
This game not only focuses on Kindergarten Math but also extends to First Grade Learning Games, ensuring continuous learning. Kids will have fun while practicing counting, comparing numbers, and solving puzzles, making math a joyous adventure.


ADDITIONAL FEATURES
• Professionally narrated instructions and numbers make learning easy for non-readers.
• Engaging and catchy music keeps kids energized while they play.
• Parental controls allow for a distraction-free learning environment, with options to turn off sounds, music, and in-app purchases.


PARENTAL PEACE OF MIND
With our commitment to child safety, Animal Kindergarten Math Games does not collect any personal information from users. Parents can feel assured knowing their child is learning in a secure and educational environment.

Download Animal Kindergarten Math Games today, and make learning math a fun adventure!
